paper_abstract: In this paper, we study the properties of solution for general Metric Dynamical Systems. Similarly to the procedure followed in the proof of classical results for differential equations, we prove the existence of approximate solutions for Metric Dynamical Systems and the existence of solution as limit of approximate solutions. (C) 2014 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Cauchy-Peano theorem for Metric Dynamical Systems
